full_summary:
**Vehicle Cargo Tie Down Straps and Identification Plates**
=====================================

**Tender Details**
---------------

*   Contract Title: Vehicle Cargo Tie Down Straps and Identification Plates ([tenderNumber-numeroSoullicitation=W8486-242979/A](mailto:w8486-242979/A))
*   Amendment Number: 3
*   Tender Publication Date: February 6, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: February 20, 2024, 14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: February 26, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

**Details**
---------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to acquire approximately 2000 Vehicle Cargo Tie Down Straps (GSIN: 3990) and 1000 Identification Plates (GSIN: 9905).

**Delivery**
----------

The goods will be delivered to the Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) in Montreal, Quebec (Address: 6363 Notre Dame East, Montréal, QC H1N 3V9).

**Specifications**
----------------

*   [Vehicle Cargo Tie Down Straps](#vehicle-cargo-tie-down-straps)
    *   GSIN: 3990
    *   NSN: 3990-21-870-9526
    *   Part Number: CFE1431Y192-048
    *   Quantity: 2000
*   [Identification Plates](#identification-plates)
    *   GSIN: 9905
    *   NSN: 9905-20-010-8701
    *   Part Number: VI171107
    *   Quantity: 1000

**Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------

Bidders are required to indicate the brand name, model, and/or Part Number of the products they are proposing. The procurement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

**Contact Information**
-------------------

For more details, please contact:
Stephanie Brown, Contracting Officer
E-mail: [Stephanie.Brown@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Stephanie.Brown@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 572-5472
 Fax: Not Available

**Attachments**
--------------

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31274/w8486-242979-a-dglepm_rfp
